column4: there are 2 netcards in my computer one is enthnet ,the other is wireless ,but why can't I see the wirless card in the Network Device programme ?
maybe the wireless card doesn't work with the ubuntu modules.
hrmm :-/  iwconfig should come with ubuntu.
your wireless card was not automatically configured
first iteration: install ubuntu.  then come back

what the hell did you pay for?
